author: hossman
msg: SOLR-3134 / SOLR-3335: fix copy/paste mistake in queryPartialResults ... we can't query arbitrary 'clients' because some of the jetty instances are shut down ... should be querying the upClients

author: stefan2
msg: Turn hard-coded deltification parameters into config parameters
for format 4 and later (they all keep compatibility with 1.6 and 1.7).
(fs_fs_data_t): add new config options as members
(read_config): read / init the new config options
(write_config): extend the template for new config files
(choose_delta_base, write_final_rev): use config parameter instead of #defines
